content: With the Transformation equipped, you can transform into a stone monkey, gaining immunity to Shock and Poison. At the same time, you are able to absorb and convert Frost and Scorch to empower yourself, retaining access to the Destined One's Spells and converting any pre-transformation Focus for use afterward.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Azure_Dome.md', within the main section titled 'Azure Dome'.
The content is as follows:
With the Transformation equipped, you can transform into a stone monkey, gaining immunity to Shock and Poison. At the same time, you are able to absorb and convert Frost and Scorch to empower yourself, retaining access to the Destined One's Spells and converting any pre-transformation Focus for use afterward.
